title: Cant login "An execpted error
body:
I put in my username / pw and into the lol client and it says immeadiately after "An unexpected error has occured while logging in. Please try again. If the error persists contact lol support."
I even created a new account and it wont work.  I was playing like 10 hours ago after so i was playing the new patch with yas and riven so idk what the hell is going on.  Anyone else having the same issue?

replies.body: This error is likely network based, not account, but I'd like to help.  Your connection might have run into problems reaching the authentication server, and resulting in an error.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and restore access.  You mention using the HRT, which has a feature auto-configure your firewall settings as well.  Let me know how that works for you.

please help, ive tried fixing the client in the login screen, detecting corruption that didnt work
i tried the hextect client program, idk how to use it or used it and that didnt work either.
